mapper.update:
update t_app_info
software_name = #{softwareName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APK_name = #{apkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supportROM = #{supportROM,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
interfaceLanguage = #{interfaceLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
softwareSize = #{softwareSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE},
devId = #{devId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
appInfo = #{appInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT},
onSaleDate = #{onSaleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
offSaleDate = #{offSaleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
flatFormId = #{flatFormId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
categoryLevel3 = #{categoryLevel3,jdbcType=BIGINT},
downloads = #{downloads,jdbcType=BIGINT},
createdBy = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creationDate = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifyBy = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
categoryLevel1 = #{categoryLevel1,jdbcType=BIGINT},
categoryLevel2 = #{categoryLevel2,jdbcType=BIGINT},
logoPicPath = #{logoPicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logoLocPath = #{logoLocPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
versionId = #{versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_app_info set software_name = #{softwareName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APK_name = #{apkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supportROM = #{supportROM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interfaceLanguage = #{interfaceLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, softwareSize = #{softwareSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, devId = #{devId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, appInfo = #{appInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, onSaleDate = #{onSaleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, offSaleDate = #{offSaleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, flatFormId = #{flatFormId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, categoryLevel3 = #{categoryLevel3,jdbcType=BIGINT}, downloads = #{downloads,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createdBy = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creationDate = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyBy = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, categoryLevel1 = #{categoryLevel1,jdbcType=BIGINT}, categoryLevel2 = #{categoryLevel2,jdbcType=BIGINT}, logoPicPath = #{logoPicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logoLocPath = #{logoLocPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, versionId = #{versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select app.id, app.software_name, app.APK_name, app.supportROM, app.interfaceLanguage, app.softwareSize, app.updateDate, app.devId, app.appInfo, app.status, dic1.value_name as statusName, app.onSaleDate, app.offSaleDate, dic2.value_name as flatFormName, ca3.categoryName as categoryLevel3Name, app.categoryLevel3, app.downloads, app.createdBy, app.creationDate, app.modifyBy, app.modifyDate, ca1.categoryName as categoryLevel1Name, app.categoryLevel1, ca2.categoryName as categoryLevel2Name, app.categoryLevel2, app.logoPicPath, app.logoLocPath, tav.versionNo as versionName from t_data_dictionary dic1, t_data_dictionary dic2, t_app_info app join t_app_category ca1 on ca1.id = app.categoryLevel1 join t_app_category ca2 on ca2.id = app.categoryLevel2 join t_app_category ca3 on ca3.id = app.categoryLevel3 join t_app_version tav on tav.id = app.versionId where dic1.type_code = 'APP_STATUS' and dic1.value_id = app.status and dic2.type_code = 'APP_FLATFORM' and dic2.value_id = app.flatFormId and app.id = #{appInfoId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_app_info (id, software_name, APK_name, supportROM, interfaceLanguage, softwareSize, updateDate, devId, appInfo, status, onSaleDate, offSaleDate, flatFormId, categoryLevel3, downloads, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, categoryLevel1, categoryLevel2, logoPicPath, logoLocPath, versionId) values (#{appInfo.id}, #{appInfo.softwareName}, #{appInfo.apkName}, #{appInfo.supportROM}, #{appInfo.interfaceLanguage}, #{appInfo.softwareSize}, #{appInfo.updateDate}, #{appInfo.devId}, #{appInfo.appInfo}, #{appInfo.status}, #{appInfo.onSaleDate}, #{appInfo.offSaleDate}, #{appInfo.flatFormId}, #{appInfo.categoryLevel3}, #{appInfo.downloads}, #{appInfo.createdBy}, #{appInfo.creationDate}, #{appInfo.modifyBy}, #{appInfo.modifyDate}, #{appInfo.categoryLevel1}, #{appInfo.categoryLevel2}, #{appInfo.logoPicPath}, #{appInfo.logoLocPath}, #{appInfo.versionId})
mapper.update: update t_app_info set logoPicPath=null, logoLocPath=null where id = #{id};

update t_app_info
software_name = #{appInfo.softwareName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APK_name = #{appInfo.apkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supportROM = #{appInfo.supportROM,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
interfaceLanguage = #{appInfo.interfaceLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
softwareSize = #{appInfo.softwareSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
updateDate = #{appInfo.updateDate,jdbcType=DATE},
devId = #{appInfo.devId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
appInfo = #{appInfo.appInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{appInfo.status,jdbcType=BIGINT},
onSaleDate = #{appInfo.onSaleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
offSaleDate = #{appInfo.offSaleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
flatFormId = #{appInfo.flatFormId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
categoryLevel3 = #{appInfo.categoryLevel3,jdbcType=BIGINT},
downloads = #{appInfo.downloads,jdbcType=BIGINT},
createdBy = #{appInfo.createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creationDate = #{appInfo.creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifyBy = #{appInfo.modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifyDate = #{appInfo.modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
categoryLevel1 = #{appInfo.categoryLevel1,jdbcType=BIGINT},
categoryLevel2 = #{appInfo.categoryLevel2,jdbcType=BIGINT},
logoPicPath = #{appInfo.logoPicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logoLocPath = #{appInfo.logoLocPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
versionId = #{appInfo.versionId},
where id=#{appInfo.id};
